```{r}
library(betareg)
library(easystats)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

n = 100
x = rnorm(n)
y = 0.2*x + rnorm(n)

my_tib <- tibble::tibble(
  predictor = x, 
  outcome = y
)
```

```{r}
my_tib <- my_tib |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    outcome_transformed = normalize(outcome, include_bounds=0.001)
  )
```

```{r}
model_beta <- betareg::betareg(
  outcome_transformed ~ predictor,
  data = my_tib, 
  link = "logit"
)
```

```{r}
model_beta |> model_parameters(exponentiate = TRUE)
```


```{r}
emmeans::emmeans(
  model_beta, 
  specs = "predictor", 
  at = list(predictor = c(0, 1, 2)), 
  type = "prob"
) |> 
  as.data.frame() |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    raw_prediction = emmean*10
  )
```

```{r}
odds_0 <- 0.450 / (1-0.450) # intercept

odds_1 <- 0.496 / (1-0.496) # b1

odds_1 / odds_0
```
